revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The sermons, and other practical works, of the late Reverend and learned Mr. Ralph Erskine, minister of the Gospel in Dunfermline... 2v. (Glasgow : Printed by Robe..."
revision.text: Possibly: The sermons, and other practical works, of the late Reverend and learned Mr. Ralph Erskine, minister of the Gospel in Dunfermline... 2v. (Glasgow : Printed by Robert Urie, for John Newlands, the editor; and sold by him at his shop in Head of the Gallowgate, Glasgow, MDCCLXIV [1764-1765]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1871535~S1
